Name: Christmas Cheer-re
Ingredients: 30 ml Mancino Vermouth di Torino Chinato
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: Genever provides the yuletide spirit base, sweetened and flavoured by cherry liqueur, with chinato drying and adding wine notes while gin adds freshness and botanical complexity. Maraschino and orange bitters complete this festive tipple.
History: Created in December 2014 by yours truly and christened by Paloma.
Nutrition: One serving of Christmas Cheer-re contains 284 calories
